overview: Chess can become an obsession, but for Eddie, it is a way of life. Facing personal dilemmas with his teenage daughter, and fantasizing about a beautiful deli waitress, he encounters Geoff, his guardian angel who looks all too human.  Director Michel Cosma Writers Michel CosmaHamisa Dor Stars Judy AltmanTheodore BouloukosJames C. Bristow
title: Chess 2016
